entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with snow near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
